RAE.TYPES.statusEffect.FIELDS.statusId.label: Status
RAE.TYPES.statusEffect.FIELDS.statusId.hint: The status effect to apply when one of the events occurs.
RAE.TYPES.statusEffect.FIELDS.overlay.label: Overlay
RAE.TYPES.statusEffect.FIELDS.overlay.hint: Display the status effect as an overlay.

RAE.TYPES.statusEffectEvents.FIELDS.action.label: Action
RAE.TYPES.statusEffectEvents.FIELDS.action.hint: What to do with the status effect.

RAE.TYPES.activeEffect.FIELDS.uuid.label: Active Effect
RAE.TYPES.activeEffect.FIELDS.uuid.hint: The Active Effect to use when a token enters the Region.
RAE.TYPES.activeEffect.FIELDS.disable.label: Disable Effect
RAE.TYPES.activeEffect.FIELDS.disable.hint: Disable the active effect when leaving the Region instead of deleting it.

RAE.TYPES.activeEffectEvents.FIELDS.action.label: Action
RAE.TYPES.activeEffectEvents.FIELDS.action.hint: What to do with an active effect.
RAE.TYPES.activeEffectEvents.FIELDS.uuid.label: Active Effect
RAE.TYPES.activeEffectEvents.FIELDS.uuid.hint: The Active Effect to add or reset duration.
RAE.TYPES.activeEffectEvents.FIELDS.name.label: Effect Name
RAE.TYPES.activeEffectEvents.FIELDS.name.hint: The name of the active effect to enable/disable/delete.
